an6.61:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
an6.61:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an6.61:5.1: * ‘Yo ubhonte viditvāna,
an6.61:5.2: majjhe mantā na lippati;
an6.61:5.4: sodha sibbini maccagā’”ti.
an6.61:6.1: “Katamo nu kho, āvuso, eko anto, katamo dutiyo anto, kiṃ majjhe, kā sibbinī”ti?
an6.61:6.2: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:6.3: “phasso kho, āvuso, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:6.4: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:6.5: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti. (1)
an6.61:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:7.2: “atītaṃ kho, āvuso, eko anto, anāgataṃ dutiyo anto, paccuppannaṃ majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:7.3: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:7.4: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti. (2)
an6.61:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:8.2: “sukhā, āvuso, vedanā eko anto, dukkhā vedanā dutiyo anto, adukkhamasukhā vedanā majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:8.3: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:8.4: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti. (3)
an6.61:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:9.2: “nāmaṃ kho, āvuso, eko anto, rūpaṃ dutiyo anto, viññāṇaṃ majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:9.3: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:9.4: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti. (4)
an6.61:10.1: Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:10.2: “cha kho, āvuso, ajjhattikāni āyatanāni eko anto, cha bāhirāni āyatanāni dutiyo anto, viññāṇaṃ majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:10.3: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:10.4: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti. (5)
an6.61:11.1: Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:11.2: “sakkāyo kho, āvuso, eko anto, sakkāyasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkāyanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:11.3: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:11.4: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti. (6)
an6.61:12.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:12.2: “byākataṃ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ.
an6.61:12.5: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā”ti. (7)
an6.61:13.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho therā bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paccassosuṃ.
an6.61:13.2: Atha kho therā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an6.61:13.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho therā bhikkhū yāvatako ahosi sabbeheva saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo, taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
an6.61:13.6: “Sabbesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, subhāsitaṃ pariyāyena, api ca yaṃ mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ pārāyane metteyyapañhe:
an6.61:15.1: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.61:15.2: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho therā bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an6.61:15.4: “phasso kho, bhikkhave, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:15.5: taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:15.6: Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
